Verses: 1 boomiyile Poraada Manushanukkuk Kurikkappatta Kaalam Undallavo? Avan Naatkal Oru Koolikkaaran Naatkalaippol Irukkiradhallavo?
2 oru Velaiyaal Nizhalai Vaanjiththu, Oru Koolikkaaran Than Kooliyai Varappaarththirukkiradhupola,
3 maayaiyaana Maadhangal Ennudaiya Sudhandharamaagi, Sanjalamaana Raaththirigal Enakkuk Kurikkappattadhu.
4 naan Paduththukkollugirapodhu, Eppozhudhu Ezhundhiruppen? Raakkaalam Eppozhudhu Mudiyum Endru Solli, Kizhakku Velukkumattum Arandu Puralugiradhinaal Enakkup Podhumendru Pogiradhu.
5 en Maamsam Poochchigalinaalum, Adaipatrina Puzhudhiyinaalum Moodappattirukkiradhu; En Thol Vediththu Aruvaruppaayitru.
6 en Naatkal Neygiravan Erigira Naadaavilum Theeviramaai Odugiradhu; Avaigal Nambikkaiyillaamal Mudindhupogum.
7 en Praanan Kaatraippolirukkiradhendrum, En Kangal Ini Nanmaiyaik Kaanappogiradhillaiyendrum Ninaiththarulum.
8 ippodhu Ennaik Kaangiravargalin Kangal Ini Ennaik Kaanbadhillai; Ummudaiya Kangal Enmel Nokkamaayirukkiradhu; Naano Illaamarpogiren.
9 megam Parandhupogiradhupola, Paadhaalaththil Irangugiravan Ini Erivaraan.
10 ini Than Veettukkuth Thirumbaan, Avan Sthalam Ini Avanai Ariyaadhu.
11 aagaiyaal Naan En Vaayai Adakkaamal, En Aaviyin Vedhanaiyinaal Pesi, En Aaththumaththin Kasappinaal Angalaaippen.
12 dhevareer Enmel Kaaval Vaikkiradharku Naan Samuththiramo? Naan Oru Thimingilamo?
13 en Kattil Enakku Aarudhal Kodukkum Endrum, En Padukkai En Thavippai Aatrum Endrum Naan Solvenaagil,
14 neer Soppanangalaal Ennaik Kalangappanni, Dharisanangalaal Enakkuth Thigilundaakkugireer.
15 adhinaal En Aaththumaa, Nerukkundu Saagiradhaiyum, En Elumbugalode Uyirodirukkiradhaippaarkkilum, Maranaththaiyum Virumbugiradhu.
16 ippadiyirukkiradhai Arosikkiren, Ennaalum Uyirodirukka Virumben, Ennai Vittuvidum; En Naatkal Maayaidhaane.
17 manushanai Neer Oru Poruttaaga Ennugiradharkum, Avanmel Sindhai Vaikkiradharkum,
18 kaalaidhorum Avanai Visaarikkiradharkum, Nimishandhorum Avanai Sodhikkiradharkum, Avan Emmaaththiram?
19 naan En Umizhneerai Vizhungaadhapadi Eththanaikaalam Ennai Negizhaamalum, Ennai Vidaamalum Iruppeer.
20 mannuyiraik Kaappavare, Paavancheydhenaanaal Umakku Naan Seyyavendiyadhu Enna? Naan Enakkuththaane Baaramaayirukkumpadikku, Neer Ennai Umakku Lakkaaga Vaiththadhu Enna?
21 en Meerudhalai Neer Manniyaamalum, En Akkiramaththai Neekkaamalum Irukkiradhu Enna? Ippozhudhe Mannil Paduththukkolven; Vidiyarkaalaththile Ennaith Theduveeraanaal Naan Iren Endraan.
